Common.builtWith: Built with ❤️ using Next.js, Floating UI, and Tailwind CSS

Homepage.title: Multiple Layout Templates
Homepage.subtitle: Experience different layout templates for your Next.js blog. Choose between minimal blank layouts or feature-rich contained layouts with headers, footers, and sidebars.

blankTemplate.title: Blank Template
blankTemplate.description: Clean slate for complete creative freedom

containedTemplate.title: Contained Template
containedTemplate.description: Structured layout with navigation and content areas

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.description: Animated landing page with floating elements

hero.title: Build Amazing Experiences
hero.subtitle: Create stunning web applications with modern tools, beautiful animations, and seamless user interactions that your users will love.

watchDemoContent.title: Watch Demo Video
watchDemoContent.description: See how easy it is to create beautiful animations and interactions

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build modern, scalable applications with exceptional user experiences

beautiful.title: Beautiful Design
beautiful.description: Stunning UI components with modern design principles
beautiful.details: Our design system follows the latest trends with carefully crafted components that look great on any device.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Optimized performance for the best user experience
fast.details: Built with performance in mind, featuring lazy loading, code splitting, and optimal bundle sizes.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.details: Advanced security measures including encryption, secure authentication, and regular security audits.

mobile.title: Mobile First
mobile.description: Responsive design that works on all devices
mobile.details: Mobile-first approach ensures your application looks and works perfectly on any screen size.

developer.title: Developer Friendly
developer.details: Well-structured codebase with comprehensive documentation, examples, and TypeScript support.

animations.title: Rich Animations
animations.details: Carefully crafted animations using modern web standards for smooth, performant user interactions.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who are already building amazing experiences with our platform.

FloatingUI.title: Floating UI Integration
FloatingUI.subtitle: Powerful tooltips, popovers, and dropdowns using Floating UI with Next.js

tooltips.title: Tooltip Components
tooltips.description: Hover over elements to see intelligent tooltips with auto-positioning
tooltips.rightContent: This tooltip appears on the right side
tooltips.bottomContent: This tooltip appears on the bottom
tooltips.leftContent: This tooltip appears on the left side

richTooltip.title: Rich Content Tooltip
richTooltip.description: This tooltip contains multiple elements and rich formatting.

popovers.title: Popover Components
popovers.description: Click to open interactive popover panels with custom content

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Manage your account preferences and security settings.

newsletter.title: Newsletter Signup
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates delivered to your inbox.

dropdowns.title: Dropdown Components
dropdowns.description: Feature-rich dropdown menus with keyboard navigation and icons

keyboardNav.title: Keyboard Navigation:
keyboardNav.arrows: Use arrow keys to navigate menu items
keyboardNav.enter: Press Enter or Space to select an item
keyboardNav.escape: Press Escape to close the dropdown
keyboardNav.type: Type to search and highlight matching items

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: Something went wrong!
500.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

global.title: Critical Error
global.description: A critical error occurred that prevented the application from loading properly.
